title: @Riot: Your LCS casters are so unprofessional
body: And that's why we love them. Keep it up :3

replies.body: Zirene's my roomie. He's also funny as hell, and dances better than you.

Trust us, we know.
http://cdn.yourepeat.com/media/gif/001/731/641/60cdfc040001e9e8d5a603bac285212a.gif
My god that is awesome.
he creamed all over your team.

How do I not see any comments for Doa?! DoA is one of the most amazing colour commentators for eSports as a whole. Both Hearthstone and LoL. I mean come on, how can you not love the man after this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7R6D_gJ8h4M

Seriously, that was just pure gold. I would probably die laughing with a Monte/DoA/Phreak tricast

I watch mostly LCK and I used to watch IPL when it was a thing. DoA is my absolute favorite caster! Sometimes when there's a pause in game I hope it's gonna be really long because then DoA gets to tell stories and ramble and it's always awesome. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Fantomex XIII,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dcVLgN0I,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-07-20T08:37:06.467+0000)
>
> How do I not see any comments for Doa?! DoA is one of the most amazing colour commentators for eSports as a whole. Both Hearthstone and LoL. I mean come on, how can you not love the man after this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7R6D_gJ8h4M
> 
> Seriously, that was just pure gold. I would probably die laughing with a Monte/DoA/Phreak tricast

I voted for his duo montecristo since he was absent
that was an intense play.....

riv is the reason i wish khazix was a strong competitive pick once again... miss those times


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DJhTZP1RAKA
Phreak was on fire today during the GV/T8 match.

Phreak and Kobe helped make that match just so amazing. Phreak's reaction to Move's amazing baron steal was hilarious.
So were the "I love you" moments
Joe "Please don't call me Joe Miller, just call me Joe" Miller
Froskurin, by far. Most knowledgeable Caster out there, still easy to listen to as she´s not a dick about it, unlike monte....also she really seems to enjoy the games and can appreciate silly plays.
Monte's not a dick... he's just realistic.. and wonderful :)
ah well, sometimes he really tunnels to hard on some mistakes - without DOA to balance him out it would be really hard to listen to it from time to time...

> [{quoted}](name=Don Eulrich,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dcVLgN0I,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2015-07-20T09:49:13.769+0000)
>
> ah well, sometimes he really tunnels to hard on some mistakes - without DOA to balance him out it would be really hard to listen to it from time to time...

Is why I don't bother even watching LCK if Doa isn't there. Monte is so dry without him because he only focuses on analysis and is far too critical.

Feels like Doa has to try even harder to keep thing light. Just imagine him with DeMan or Kobe.

Agreed, she's great to listen to with how knowledgeable she is. Also, Monte is a dick, but he's also really knowledgeable. His dickishness is pretty funny too. I'll always remember when he was going over UoL VS SK semi's, and he said out of nowhere "Also FFS Freddy upgrade your trinket."

> [{quoted}](name=Don Eulrich,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dcVLgN0I,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-07-20T01:44:48.520+0000)
>
> Froskurin, by far. Most knowledgeable Caster out there, still easy to listen to as she´s not a dick about it, unlike monte....also she really seems to enjoy the games and can appreciate silly plays.

Wait, Froskurin isn't a dick about it? Have you not followed her very long? She is 100% the LPL (and female) verison of Monte, except she talks MORE shit lol

I mean, Thorin made a chinese LPL show called "Incoming Aggression" with her, because he knows how much shit she stirs up with her very blunt opinions and tendencies to be a dick and make people mad.

I actually like her even less now because at least she spoke her mind before, despite crap talking Riot and everyone not Chinese, but now she is just a suck up because she has a caster job.

Kobe

There was also this one guy, he had a strong accent. He left last year, I forgot his name, but bearded and chubby. That guy was good
DeMan or Joe Miller? They were both great in EU, they casted fantastically together.
DeMan?

> [{quoted}](name=xJLx MCHammer,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dcVLgN0I,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-20T01:23:51.029+0000)
>
> Kobe
> 
> There was also this one guy, he had a strong accent. He left last year, I forgot his name, but bearded and chubby. That guy was good

Joe Miller?

Across both NA and EU it's hard to tell since all the EU casters are pretty good. I'd probably choose Deficio (spelling?) but out of NA I'd choose Kobe. Can't decide on the best

Side note: I hate Monte
http://i.imgur.com/NOIJeoN.gif
Deman was a big fave of mine. Him and Joe were a good pairing. I remember this game at s2 worlds where the are far was chasing kogmaw forever and Deman just goes "kill him goddamnit"
TrinityPhreak will always be the best. Though Zirene is catching up with how Phreak hasn't looked like Sheldon Cooper in quite some time.

When Doa and Monte start talking about some teoretical aspects of the league like - how can piltover customs blitz go through the river and still function properly - things like that are just priceless :D
I may be one of the only people in the League community that genuinely enjoys Monte.
Monte's the only one I can take seriously. He's the only one who tells it straight.
That's another reason I love him. However, he also has some of the funniest random jokes... like the Raptor Wars movie idea xD

> [{quoted}](name=Nsqui,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dcVLgN0I,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-20T01:23:01.325+0000)
>
> I may be one of the only people in the League community that genuinely enjoys Monte.

I do to, he is glorious.

> [{quoted}](name=Nsqui,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dcVLgN0I,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-20T01:23:01.325+0000)
>
> I may be one of the only people in the League community that genuinely enjoys Monte.

I used to, but he is a bit of a douche these days.

That's true - but I feel like that's just _him_ - his personality probably leads him to be like that, and I think it may be subconscious. I know that I make a lot of sarcastic and douchey remarks jokingly, and that's just how my personality is - but my friends are all used to it and understand that it's in good humor. The issue is arises when you hang out with people who aren't used to your comments and such, because they could take the remarks the wrong way and be genuinely hurt - but when you've done it for so long you don't really have an off switch. I think Monte tends to be that way.
Rivington is hot <3
A fact far too rarely mentioned or appreciated! He's got a suaveness that I'm simultaneously jealous of and attracted to.
I was so concerned at first LOL
Riv, Kobe, and Phreak are my favorites. A tri-cast with those 3 are always fun.
i just feel like phreak because its just... he says some of the stupidest sht and its so funny :D

I gotta say Phreak  for just enjoyment, Jatt for his analysis

EDIT: Oh, and Riv is just awesome
Kobe loves you too.
I tried to edit in Kobe right after posting but you can't :(
I like all of the Lol casters that I've heard, but I think Krepo's my favorite.
Krepo is on the rise, but he still has yet to dethrone Phreak, if only because Phreak has been around (as a caster) so much longer.
Phreak he's Mr. Punnyman.
He's Phreaking hilarious!
Riv for sure. Phreak is funny, but Riv just gets the hype going in a match and is generally a better caster when it comes to what's actually going on in-game. Phreak has the best banter though.
Phreak because he makes any LCS game funny. And typically makes the most hilarious jokes when someone makes a big screw up.

How does Kobe not even make your list?  IMO he and Phreak are head and shoulders above the others....who, don't get me wrong, I also like.  

Although I have to admit Riv wears a particular phrase out and I cringe every time he says "x team is getting everything they want."  Still love the guy though.  I'm sure it's not easy finding new ways to describe a team pushing advantages.

Also, I really miss Deman and Joe Miller.  Both top tier talents.

And I know Dash isn't a caster, but he is damn good at jockying the analyst desk.  He was a great acquisition.  Lots of charm and quick on his feet.

Riot Games as a whole are largely unprofessional, and that's why I love them. They strive to put a smile on everyone's face via many things, rather than be super serious like other corporations. Maintain that standard, Rito!
